Posts.Content: hi! you must be going out of your mind! sorry! but you MUST INSIST on a more clearer concept of your problem,from your doctors or consultants.my wife ,in 2005 had her breast reconstructed,and to look at it now,youd never think it was a reconstructed boob!!!!honest.do go into the nbcri site,here in ireland,where ,here in galway,mr michael kerin heads the team,take care! sam.roger.do contact us,collette my wife or myself if u need more advice.
Posts.Title: Can anyone offer me some guidence
